title: Spicy Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful and spicy chicken curry recipe that will tantalize your taste buds.

steps.instruction: Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and saut√© until golden brown.
Add minced garlic and grated ginger, and cook for 1 minute.
Add diced tomatoes and cook until softened.
Stir in curry powder, chili powder, and salt.
Add chicken thighs and cook until browned on all sides.
Pour in coconut milk, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
